com.google.code.siren4j.component
Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionImpl
public interface Action

Represents a Siren Action. Actions show available behaviors an entity exposes.

Method Summary
 List<String> getActionClass()
          Describes the nature of an action based on the current representation.

          A collection of fields, expressed as an array of objects in JSON Siren such as { "fields" : [{ ...

          An enumerated attribute mapping to a protocol method.
 String getName()
          A string that identifies the action to be performed.
 String getTitle()
          Descriptive text about the action.
 String getType()
          The encoding type for the request.
 void setHref(String href)
          Sets the value of the href.
 

Method Detail

getName

String getName()
A string that identifies the action to be performed. (Required).

Returns:
never null or empty.

getActionClass

List<String> getActionClass()
Describes the nature of an action based on the current representation. Possible values are implementation-dependent and should be documented. (Optional).

Returns:
a list of strings, may be null or empty.

getMethod

ActionImpl.Method getMethod()
An enumerated attribute mapping to a protocol method. For HTTP, these values may be GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, or PATCH. Defaults to GET (Optional).

Returns:
never null.
See Also:
ActionImpl.Method

getHref

String getHref()
The URI of the action. (Required).

Returns:
never null.

setHref

void setHref(String href)
Sets the value of the href.

Parameters:
href - cannot be null or empty.

getTitle

String getTitle()
Descriptive text about the action. (Optional).

Returns:
may be null or empty.

getType

String getType()
The encoding type for the request. When omitted and the fields attribute exists, the default value is application/x-www-form-urlencoded. (Optional).

Returns:
never null or empty.

getFields

List<Field> getFields()
A collection of fields, expressed as an array of objects in JSON Siren such as { "fields" : [{ ... }] }. See Fields. (Optional).

Returns:
